messages.subject: Seppa article
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All I am writing a small article on seppa and found a note to the book Kinko: Tsubako: Katana no Kodogu by Mr. Kamiya Monichiro, Tokuma publishing co,
messages.messageBody:
Dear All

I am writing a small article on seppa and found a note to the book

Kinko: Tsubako: Katana no Kodogu by Mr. Kamiya Monichiro, Tokuma
publishing co, Tokyo 1963

does anyone have a copy of book? Does it have anything about seppa?


Also if you have any strange seppa and are going to the Chicago show
please bring them so I can
take photos

later
david

--
David McDonald Collector of Japanese Swords and Old Iron
PO Box 265 WEB page - http://www.montanairon.com
Sidney MT 59270 email - jswords@...
406-482-3243 evenings I do tsukamaki (wrapping of sword hilts)

Owner of White IH Cub & Super A Farmall, IH 100 & 130, 140, AC G
McD type M, Monitor, Frost King and other stationary engines.
